com.gwtplatform.mvp.rebind

Class ClassInspector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gwtplatform.mvp.rebind.ClassInspector

  • public class ClassInspector
extends Object
    A helper class that can be used to inspect a class for methods having specific signatures.
    Author:
    Philippe Beaudoin

    • Method Summary

      void collectAnnotatedMethods(Class<? extends Annotation> annotation, List<JMethod> collection)

    • Method Detail

      • findMethodWithoutParamsReturning

        public JMethod findMethodWithoutParamsReturning(JClassType returnType)
                                         throws UnableToCompleteException
        Inspects the methods to find one that return the specified type. The method can be either in the inspected class or any of its parent classes. It can be static or not.
        Parameters:
        returnType - The type that should be returned by the method.
        Returns:
        The method returning returnType, or null if not found.
        Throws:
        UnableToCompleteException - If more than one matching method is found.

      • findMethodWithoutParamsReturning

        public JMethod findMethodWithoutParamsReturning(JGenericType returnType,
                                       JClassType returnTypeParameter)
                                         throws UnableToCompleteException
        Inspects the methods to find one that return the specified parameterized type with the specified type as a parameter. The method can be either in the inspected class or any of its parent classes. It can be static or not.
        Parameters:
        returnType - The parameterized type that should be returned by the method.
        returnTypeParameter - The type parameter of returnType.
        Returns:
        The method returning returnType<returnTypeParameter>, or null if not found.
        Throws:
        UnableToCompleteException - If more than one matching method is found.

      • findAnnotatedMethodWithoutParamsReturning

        public JMethod findAnnotatedMethodWithoutParamsReturning(JClassType returnType,
                                                Class<? extends Annotation> annotation,
                                                boolean failIfAnnotationIsFoundOnWrongMethod)
                                                  throws UnableToCompleteException
        Inspects the methods to find one that return the specified type and is annotated with the specified annotation. The method can be either in the inspected class or any of its parent classes. It can be static or not.
        Parameters:
        returnType - The type that should be returned by the method.
        annotation - The annotation that should be present on the method.
        failIfAnnotationIsFoundOnWrongMethod - If true, the call will throw an UnableToCompleteException and log an error if the annotation is found on the wrong method.
        Returns:
        The method returning returnType and annotated with annotation, or null if not found.
        Throws:
        UnableToCompleteException - If more than one matching method is found, or if the annotation is found on another method and failIfAnnotationIsFoundOnWrongMethod is true.

      • findAnnotatedMethod

        public JMethod findAnnotatedMethod(Class<? extends Annotation> annotation)
                            throws UnableToCompleteException
        Inspects the methods to find one annotated with the specified annotation. The method can be either in the inspected class or any of its parent classes. It can be static or not.
        Parameters:
        annotation - The annotation that should be present on the method.
        Returns:
        The method annotated with annotation, or null if not found.
        Throws:
        UnableToCompleteException - If more than one matching method is found.

      • findMethod

        public JMethod findMethod(String methodName,
                 JClassType parameterType)
        Inspects the class for a method with the given name and taking exactly one parameter of the specified type, or of a subtype of that type.
        Parameters:
        methodName - The name of the method to look for.
        parameterType - The type of the unique parameter accepted by that method.
        Returns:
        The method, or null if not found.

      • collectAnnotatedMethods

        public void collectAnnotatedMethods(Class<? extends Annotation> annotation,
                           List<JMethod> collection)
        Collects the methods to find one annotated with the specified annotation. The method can be either in the inspected class or any of its parent classes. It can be static or not.
        Parameters:
        annotation - The annotation that should be present on the methods.
        collection - The list in which to collect matching methods.

      • getAllMethods

        public List<JMethod> getAllMethods()
        Collects all methods from either the inspected class or any of its parent classes.

      • collectStaticAnnotatedFields

        public void collectStaticAnnotatedFields(JClassType type,
                                JClassType typeParameter,
                                Class<? extends Annotation> annotation,
                                List<JField> collection)
                                  throws UnableToCompleteException
        Inspects the fields to collect the ones of the specified parameterized type with the specified type as a parameter annotated with the specified annotation. The field can be either in the inspected class or any of its parent classes. Only static fields are collected.
        Parameters:
        type - The parameterized type of the desired fields.
        typeParameter - The type parameter of type.
        annotation - The annotation that should be present on the field.
        collection - The list in which to collect matching fields.
        Throws:
        UnableToCompleteException - If a field annotated with annotation is found that does not respect the other criteria of the search.
